title: WTB: Big Backs or Cobb / WaJo Hands
author: Cmvorce

posts.post_title: WTB: Big Backs or Cobb / WaJo Hands
posts.post_content:
All, I was pulling funds together for a specific purchase that didn't materialize, so now I have a decent amount of money burning a hole in my pocket and no self control. Bad combination. 

I'm considering a number of things but specific to T206 would be very interested in the following:

Ty Cobb Bat On (any common back) in PSA / SGC 1-1.5
Ty Cobb Bat Off (any common back) in PSA / SGC 1-1.5
Walter Johnson Hands at Chest in a Sweet Cap 460 series or Tolstoi back in PSA / SGC 1-2 or raw
Lenox Back (ideally a New York Giant but open to other teams, player unimportant) in PSA / SGC 1-1.5 or raw
UZIT back (any player / any team) in PSA or SGC 1 or raw
Drum back (any player / any team) in PSA or SGC 1 or raw

If you have any of the above and are looking to sell, please let me know. Thanks in advance. 

Chris
